__TOC__

An attempt to group orders from the Canonical shop.

Procedure: (subject to change)

 1. Fill in the 2 tables below. Use 1 line per size per item. (If you need 1 shirt in 2 sizes, use 2 lines)
 2. Ordering will be done every 2 months if total order amount exceeds 100 Euro.
 3. Next ordering date will be '''December 13'''
 4. Add 5 Euro for shipping. If this amount exceeds the actual shipping costs, you'll be offered the choice to get a refund or donate to Ubuntu-be.
 4. Make a payment with the total amount on account number TBD with reference "Shop Order [name]".
 5. The total amount for your order should be on the bank account before '''December 6'''
 6. If an item you wanted is out of stock on '''December 6''', you'll be offered the choice to order another item or get your money back.
